body.name: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Countertop Toaster Oven with Bake Pan, Broil & Bagel Functions, Auto Shutoff, Stainless Steel (31143)

FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: SAVE TIME IN THE KITCHEN: The compact toaster oven conveniently toasts 4 slices of bread — enough for a family — to reduce the time you spend in the kitchen.

5 VERSATILE MODES: This toaster oven gives you the versatility to cook 5 ways — bake, broil, toast, bagel function and keep warm, yet it won't take up a lot of space on your kitchen countertop. It's perfect for everyday cooking tasks.

EASY-TO-USE CONTROLS: This toaster oven has simple controls that are easy to use. Perfect for anyone who wants a toaster oven that gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff.

INCLUDES BAKE PAN, OVEN RACK & CRUMB TRAY: The small toaster oven broiler has 2 rack positions and comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking and an oven rack for broiling. The slide-out crumb tray catches crumbs for easy cleanup.
COOK A VARIETY OF FOODS: You can cook many different foods with temperature options ranging from 200-450° F.
body.description: Horno tostador de acero inoxidable con capacidad para 4 rebanadas de pan o una pizza de 23 cm. Cuenta con funciones de tostado, horneado y asado, además de temporizador con apagado automático. Hornea y calienta alimentos ahorrando energía y en menor tiempo, es ideal para calentar alimentos congelados como nuggets de pollo y recalentar pan, pizzas, galletas y mucho más. Es rendidor y amplio por dentro, pero compacto y práctico por fuera, se adapta perfectamente hasta en las cocinas más pequeñas. Sus diales son fáciles de usar lo que permiten tener un control completo de la función y la temperatura.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect for everyday jobs Like making toast, cooking frozen meals and reheating leftovers but can do much more like bake a small batch of brownies or broil chicken breasts.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Countertop Toaster Oven with Bake Pan Conveniently toast 4 slices of bread to save time in the kitchen with the Hamilton Beach Toaster Oven. It gives you the versatility to cook 5 ways — bake, broil, toast, bagel function and keep warm, yet it won't take up a lot of space on your kitchen countertop. The toaster oven has simple manual controls that are straightforward and easy to use. It's great for seniors or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently does the job without being complicated. Has a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, a ready bell that rings when the cooking cycle is complete and auto shutoff Has two rack positions and includes a baking pan and oven rack Slide-out crumb tray makes cleanup easy With temperature options ranging from 200-450° F, you'll easily cook a variety of different foods in this toaster oven Bagel function perfectly toasts bagels so they're toasted on the cut side and warm and soft on the round side

Save Time in the Kitchen The toaster oven conveniently toasts 4 slices of bread — enough for a family — to reduce the time you spend in the kitchen. 5 Versatile Modes This toaster oven broiler gives you the versatility to cook 5 ways — bake, broil, toast, bagel function and keep warm, yet it won't take up a lot of space on your kitchen countertop. It's perfect for everyday jobs, like making toast, cooking frozen meals, and reheating leftovers. Easy-to-Use Controls The toaster oven has simple manual controls that are straightforward and easy to use. It's great for seniors or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff.

Includes Bake Pan, Oven Rack & Crumb Tray The toaster oven has 2 rack positions and comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking and an oven rack for broiling. The slide-out crumb tray catches crumbs for easy cleanup. Cook a Variety of Foods You can cook many different foods with temperature options ranging from 200-450° F. Enjoy Perfectly Toasted Bagels The bagel function perfectly toasts bagels so they're toasted on the cut side and warm and soft on the round side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am happy with my new oven. t works great and is a great replacement for my old toaster oven. And its small enough it doesn't crowd my counter top. I do wish it had dual elements top and bottom but its fine like it is. A simple toaster oven is hard to find in the stores now. Now all the ovens are really Air Fryers and double the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice toaster oven - however...
reviews.reviewText: I like it. It's a nice, easy-to-use design but, a few things to be aware.-- As another reviewer mentioned, it's true that the writing on the knobs isn't easy to read because it doesn't have the high contrast that black on white does. However, once you know how each knob works - the lettering is less important.-- The exterior DOES get very hot - it's metal. So, plan on only touching the handle when it's on and not placing anything plastic nearby.-- The interior is not as large as my prior toaster oven which is a bit of a bummer. The good news about that is it toasts things a bit more quickly. The bad news is I can't really cook a small, deep casserole or oatmeal bake in it like I could my prior one.As long as you understand *what* you're buying, it's a good item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good basic Toaster Oven at a good price-point
reviews.reviewText: This is a basic Toaster Oven - sized at "4 slice" so it has a small footprint, unlike the "6 slice" which are significantly larger. No frills, low cost, and it works.The GOOD: I like the way they put the drip pan under the rack. It slides in/out when roasting or broiling. Saves having to have a separate drip pan/rack for roasting and broiling - means another 1" or so of clearance inside oven. Great design idea.I thought the BAGEL option would be useless, but it has turned out to be a good feature. Basically, anything which you want toasted on one side and just warmed on the other (bagels, English muffins, croissants, sandwich rolls, etc.) you put the food on the rack in the upper level cut-side-up and use the BAGEL setting. Works well. Anything you want toasted on both sides - like bread - use the lower rack setting and the TOAST option. Kudos for providing something I didn't care about but found very helpful.The slide out crumb tray is another plus. You don't have to turn the unit on its back and tilt out the tray like some others and fish around inside where live wires are located.It heats fast - appears to have a quartz element instead of the usual wire element and that's good.The "COULD BE BETTER" items - I don't like the mechanical timer. But in fairness, it works and the results appear to be repeatable if you use the pictograms on the face of the unit. But in this day and age, a digital timer would have been preferred, together with a digital temperature readout. Others complain about the tick-tick-tick on the timer, but I didn't find that objectionable. It's not really that loud.Many of the toaster ovens have only a 30 minute timer, like this one. I think that's too little - a basic meatloaf takes about an hour. Should have a 60 minute timer.It's hard to read the information next to the dials. The dials are large (easy to grab and turn) but get in the way of reading the settings. H-B has another toaster oven at the same price with what appear to be better black plastic knobs, but different features. Why two designs of knobs?The door slams shut. It would be nice if it were damped somehow.It is bright with polished stainless (so they say) steel outer material. Stands out in the kitchen. I'd like something a bit less visible, perhaps black, or perhaps a brushed metal, or black stainless steel. I know, that's expensive, but the option even at a higher price would be nice.The VERDICT:Overall, this is a sturdy reliable oven (so far), at a great price. There don't appear to be many 4-slice toaster ovens so this is a good choice, despite the things I'd like to see different. It has a small footprint and fits where the bigger ones wouldn't. My criticisms are minor - this thing does the job and doesn't cost a huge amount. Don't be put off by the confusion on where the rack has to be - you'll get used to the options after a few uses. Some reviewers complained about cord length. We didn't find that an issue, although the cord is short. High-amperage heating appliances should not have long cords. It's a safety issue.And by the way - be sure you follow their recommendations and run the unit at high temp for 10 minutes before you put food in, to burn off any residual oils used in manufacture. After that, there is no odor from the oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: This Hamilton Beach toaster oven replaced a thirteen-year old Black and Decker that served me well. I wanted white but had to settle on silver. It serves my needs, and I am very pleased with it. I like the different settings for different foods/toast/bagels/waffles, etc. I've used them all including warming cooked foods, and they are all very efficient. It didn't take long to figure out where to put the timer to get toast to my liking. I would recommend this small toaster oven to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toaster oven does a great job. The controls are easy to understand and use. Results are consistent. It is also attractive on the counter, and the size is perfect for our needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So yes, it has only 1 heating element, as most do in this size and price range, and you get a bit if uneven toasting but every small scale toaster oven I've owned in the last 15 years has been like this. However I will admit the blank space not getting toasted is a bit more than past toasters of thr same brand and model. It does fit 4 pieces of small bread but tightly, and if you want even toasting your going to have to rotate and move them so using 4 piece becomes a chore and messy. Our main complaint is the same as others, the dial to toast is weird - the toast section is about 1/4 span and to try and find the sweet spot of a proper browning is impossible. Either you get burned or undercooked and going a tiny bit past the light will get you black so you have to babysit your toast which is not something I'm super into nor have time for. If you walk away or turn to cook your food on the stove your food will likely be burned. Moving the tray to the lowest level helps but not much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toaster oven.
reviews.reviewText: So glad I purchased this toaster oven! Works great! Just the right size for my small counter and still big enough to toast or bake whatever I choose whenever I don't want to turn my big oven on and heat up my kitchen.Bakes and toasts evenly and fast.I already have an air fryer and just wanted a regular toaster oven. Many stores do not carry them just airfryers, so glad I found this one on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: Like the smaller size that doesn’t hog counter space and even toasting of 2 slices of bread… bit less even for 4 slices with outer edges not browning as much. Bagel setting works as expected. Nice to bake or re-heat smaller items… more efficient and doesn’t heat up kitchen like using full size oven. Rack has two level settings. Crumb tray for easy cleaning. Don’t like the very small print of degrees and settings around the dials… difficult to read especially in lower light. At this price point, I am pleased with this purchase.
Best toaster-over I've ever had. (I've only ever had 2 before this one, and they were both garbage, though.) No complaints. Good size, good dial options, not difficult to keep clean.
Me gustó su tamaño muy compactoy sobre todo acabados.
The size is just right for my space. Have only used it for toast so far but works well.
I love a toaster oven. Many are not great value and can be huge and very complicated to use. This one is a great size. Lots of cooking options and not hard for guests to use. Recommend.
Bagels done perfectly. Keep warm feature is great.
